::KitKat:;

She heard Phobia and nodded, She opened her link,"PHOBIA!  Shot and 
kil the Maximals.  Shoot and KILL!"  She groaned at the pain in her 
leg.  She was leaking baddly and limped out and way from the 
cave.  "PREDACONS! PHOBIA'S SHIP IS READY TO GET US OUT OF HERE! WE 
NEED TO REGROUP!  GET TO THE SHIP!"

She opened her link to Paralysis,"WE are going to try to make it to 
Phobia's ship.  We all can meet there and regroup.  WE're just 
getting slaughtered out here."
She couldn't beleive Megatron had just left them to die like this.  
She was as loyal to her troops as they were to her.  She vowed to get 
Megatron back for his betrayal and cowardess.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> 
> BIC Phobias ship senses the fire at the Predacon cave. "Return to 
your
> landing site" he instructed. The ship returned to the base.
> 
> The back ramp opened "KitKat lead the predacons to my ship, I'll 
get them to
> safety."  The spiderbot instructed the potential leader of the 
Predacons. He
> didn't like abandoning base like this but if he had his way they'd 
have a
> better base to use to end the beast wars.
> 
>
